description.message: Chromium extension designed to customize the empty new tab page.

imageError.message: The maximum allowed image size is 8 MB.

imageStyleCoverHelp.message: Fit the background image to the size of the window.

imageStyleRepeatHelp.message: Repeat the background image across the entire window.

imageStyleCenterHelp.message: Show the background image in the center of the window.

imageSizeHelp.message: Adjust the size of the background image.

imageSizeDisabledHelp.message: The background image size cannot be adjusted when using the cover style.

imageOpacityHelp.message: Adjust the opacity of the background image.

imageHueHelp.message: Adjust the hue rotation of the image.

imageGrayscaleHelp.message: Adjust the grayscale level of the background image.

imageBlurHelp.message: Adjust the blur level of the background image.

closeDescription.message: Tired of accidentally closing tabs or the browser window when closing the last tab? Configure the alternative Close Tab shortcut to avoid this frustration.

closePinnedHelp.message: When enabled, pinned tabs will not be closed when using the keyboard shortcut to close tabs.

closeGroupedHelp.message: When enabled, grouped tabs will not be closed when using the keyboard shortcut to close tabs.

closeEmptyHelp.message: When enabled, empty new tabs will not be automatically closed when another tab is created.

resetConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to restore the default settings?
